mapper.insert: insert into pf_user_sku_stock (id, create_time, user_id, spu_id, sku_id, stock, frozen_stock, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{spuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{skuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{frozenStock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update pf_user_sku_stock set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, spu_id = #{spuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sku_id = #{skuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stock = #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, frozen_stock = #{frozenStock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, create_time, user_id, spu_id, sku_id, stock, frozen_stock, remark from pf_user_sku_stock
